strapiEdition.headline: Holidaze Pop Up Bar in Full (Socially Distanced) Swing

posts.title: Arkansas Football schedule shuffle
posts.content:
The Razorbacks were scheduled to play the Missouri Tigers this past weekend, but COVID-19 had different plans.

  • The Alabama game, which was originally scheduled for December 5, has been replaced by Arkansas vs. Mizzou in Columbia, Missouri. You can find the game on SEC Network at 11am
  • Alabama vs. Arkansas is TBA

posts.title: Holiday pop-up bar at Walton Arts Center
posts.content:
"Holidaze, a limited-time cocktail bar with a holiday theme, is back with social distancing and a new temporary home at the Walton Arts Center."

  • Last year the bar was located in Downtown Fayetteville and was very crowded. In a pandemic, that situation will not suffice, so the Holidaze team and Walton Arts Center teamed up to execute the themed bar
  • The bar opened November 20, and will remain open all year until December 31, 2020. Times, reservations, and locations can be found HERE

posts.title: Walmart Cyber Monday deals
posts.content:
On Friday, Walmart announced its Cyber Monday deals for 2020

  • Some of the items are available for next day delivery, or free two-day shipping. The deals launched at midnight last night and can be found HERE and HERE

posts.title: Fayetteville expects to receive 90k doses of vaccine
posts.content:
Fayetteville Board of Heath gathered pre-thanksgiving to discuss some recent news in regards to the vaccine

  • Fayetteville expects to receive and distribute 90,000 doses of COVID-19 vaccines by end of the year
  • "The board is asking for patience as the community waits for a COVID-19 vaccine to become available to administer." The Board anticipates that pharmacies and hospitals will be able to administer the vaccines for at risk and front-line individuals - KNWA

posts.title: Small business webinar in Spanish
posts.content:
On December 17th, Startup Junkie is hosting a small business success webinar in Spanish

  • The event will take place virtually on December 17, 2020 from 12-1p CT. The event is free. Tickets to the event can be found HERE
  • "¡Hablemos de pequeñas empresas! Únase a nosotros para algunos buenos consejos para propietarios de pequeñas empresas." - Startup Junkie
